channel.title: Quest Tab
channel.description: Hi I just got done adding Orbs to my PI and I was wanting to know how I could change the stuff in the quest tab. I am using a blank PI so all it has is quests. I know there is some Client sided and server sided work that needs to be done but I want to know how to remove the quests so I can add like player information. I have uploaded a picture of the quest tab. Things I want to remove: All Quests Where it says Free Quests and Members Quests I want those removed. I also want the scroll bar on the right to be gone. I know I am asking a lot and I appreciate all the help you guys give me. Also one more thing... I have noticed some PI's have really small font in their quest tab. How could I make mine smaller so I can add some longer sentences or words in? If this is in the wrong section please alert me and I will move it to the Client section. Thanks! If this is a bit messy I can straighten it up for you guys. :)

@RsInFecTion wrote:

^^ I’m on msn atm, il help.

item.title: Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Alright I have my quest tab set up but the only things that work are my points that you earn.
I have my Items kept on Death set up like this:

But it doesn’t do anything so I added this in ClickingButtons.java:

case 28167: if(!c.isSkulled) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); c.getItems().keepItem(0, false); c.getItems().keepItem(1, false); c.getItems().keepItem(2, false); c.getItems().keepItem(3, false); c.sendMessage("You can keep three items and a fourth if you use the protect item prayer."); } else { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); c.getItems().keepItem(0, false); c.sendMessage("You are skulled and will only keep one item if you use the protect item prayer."); } c.getItems().sendItemsKept(); c.getPA().showInterface(6960); c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); break;
I added that under:

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Hi I just got done adding Orbs to my PI and I was wanting to know how I could change the stuff in the quest tab.
I am using a blank PI so all it has is quests. I know there is some Client sided and server sided work that needs to be done but I want to know how to remove the quests so I can add like player information.
I have uploaded a picture of the quest tab.
Things I want to remove:
All Quests
Where it says Free Quests and Members Quests I want those removed.
I also want the scroll bar on the right to be gone.
I know I am asking a lot and I appreciate all the help you guys give me.
Also one more thing…
I have noticed some PI’s have really small font in their quest tab. How could I make mine smaller so I can add some longer sentences or words in?
If this is in the wrong section please alert me and I will move it to the Client section.
Thanks!
If this is a bit messy I can straighten it up for you guys.

Read full topic
